entry.title: 1 Gram Pack of 200 "Dry&Dry" Silica Gel Packets Desiccant Dehumidifiers - FDA Compliant
entry.summary:
Vendor: Others
Type: Desiccant, Moisture Absorber
Price: 9.99

1 Gram Pack of 200 "Dry&Dry" Silica Gel Packets Desiccant Dehumidifiers

  • Packet dimension : 1 1/2 " x 1 5/8 "
  • Silica Gel Beads Size : about 1 ~ 3 mm
  • High Quality Pure Silica Gel without Cobalt Chloride.
  • 30+ Year Experience in the Industry of Silica Gel Desiccant - Premium Quality Pure and Safe Silica Gel without Cobalt Chloride. NO RISK (See Our Customers' Reviews)
  • Packet Material is High Quality Coated Paper for "Ultimate Moisture Absorption and Heat Resistance for Reuse" & Meets Specifications for Food and Medications Products(US FDA 21 CFR 176.170 Compliant).
  • Packets are stored in RESEALABLE Self-Standing High Quality Bag for Easy Storage and Use - Newly Designed Air Tight Sealing & Sturdy Bag for Moisture Control.
  • We REALLY Want Our Customers to be HAPPY with Our Products. If You are not Happy, We are not Happy. Please contact us. We will Give You Free Replacement or Full Refund Even BEYOND REFUND PERIOD.

Dry&Dry - OUR PRODUCTS

  • Dry&Dry Silica Gel is a pure vitreous, porous form of silicon dioxide made from sodium silicate.
  • It is purified and processed into either granular or beaded form.
  • Its high absorption capacity is attributed to its millions of tiny pores.
  • The mechanism of absorption is purely physical, with no change in size or shape of the particles even as they become saturated.
  • Even when fully saturated, the material still looks and feels dry.

Dry&Dry - PREMIUM QUALITY

  • Our Silica Gel packaging is the highest quality in the industry for moisture protection.
  • Even our packet material was tested under strict regulation for food and medications(US FDA 21 CFR 176.170 Compliant).
  • You can experience the difference with other products.
  • Products of Dry&Dry guarantee 100% satisfaction. NO RISK
  • If you have any problems about our products, we will give you a free replacement or full refund.

entry.title: 1 Gram [10,000 Packets] Premium Silica Gel Desiccant Packets - Rechargeable Paper(FDA Compliant)

Vendor: Dry & Dry

  • Packet dimension : 1 1/2 " x 1 5/8 " 
  • Silica Gel Beads Size : about 1 ~ 3 mm
  • 30+ YEAR EXPERIENCE in the Industry of Silica Gel Desiccant
  • Premium Quality Pure and Safe Silica Gel without Cobalt Chloride. 
  • ULTIMATE MOISTURE ABSORPTION & REACTIVATION - Packet Material is High Quality Coated Paper for "Ultimate Moisture Absorption and Heat Resistance for Reuse" (Place in the Oven for 0.5 -2.0 hours at 200-250F Or Microwave for About 7-12 Minutes at DEFROST.) 
  • FOOD & PHARMACEUTICAL GRADE(US FDA 21 CFR 176.170 Compliant). - Even Our Packet Material was Tested under Strict Regulation for Food & Medication Specifications.
  • SPECIAL THICKNESS - Packets are stored in RESEALABLE Self-Standing High Quality Bag for Easy Storage and Use(Newly Designed Air Tight Sealing & Sturdy Bag for Moisture Control.)
  • Note: 10,000 Packets are stored in box(Bulk Packaging)
  • These packets do not contain indicating beads and will not change color when they are saturated.
  • 100 % SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - 100% Refund or New Replacement BEYOND REFUND PERIOD if you are not happy with our product.(See Our Customers' Reviews-World Wide Best Seller)

Dry & Dry - OUR PRODUCTS

  • Dry&Dry Silica Gel is a pure vitreous, porous form of silicon dioxide made from sodium silicate.
  • It is purified and processed into either granular or beaded form.
  • Its high absorption capacity is attributed to its millions of tiny pores.
  • The mechanism of absorption is purely physical, with no change in size or shape of the particles even as they become saturated.
  • Even when fully saturated, the material still looks and feels dry.

Dry & Dry - PREMIUM QUALITY

  • Our Silica Gel packaging is the highest quality in the industry for moisture protection.
  • Even our packet material was tested under strict regulation for food and medications(US FDA 21 CFR 176.170 Compliant).
